title: Love Island's Iain Stirling shares rare loved-up selfie with girlfriend Laura Whitmore

Voiceover and comedian Iain Stirling has shared an insight into his relationship with Irish presenter Laura Whitmore .

The ITV2 legend posted a sweet selfie with his long-term girlfriend to Instagram on Tuesday as the couple continue to enjoy their 'west to east coast' American road trip.

Iain, 31, pulled a funny unimpressed face in the snap while blonde beauty Laura, 34, looked as glamorous as ever in a zebra printed dress and a vibrant red lipstick.

(Image: Instagram)

Iain offered his followers an explanation behind the couple's rare snap .

He wrote: "Last night I went to a winery in California and didn’t drink so I could drive Laura home afterwards.

"I am posting this picture in memory of the biggest sacrifice I will ever make for another person for the rest of my life."

Highlighting the fact that he chose not to drink alcohol so that girlfriend Laura could, Iain pointed out his sacrifice and suggested how it proves his loved-up status with the presenter.

(Image: Instagram)

Laura didn't seem impressed with her beau's witty post as she responded: "I would like to point out that I was happy to drive..."

She recalled an earlier situation: "Until Iain said he left the camera I had handed him and repeatedly mentioned ‘to put in his back pack.’ So instead of taking pictures of the beautiful valley with my long lens.. I decided I’d get drunk."

The couple are currently road-tripping across America together in a lime-green Mustang and have documented their holiday with Instagram-worthy snaps.

Previous photos show the smitten pair visiting Alcatraz prison, the Golden Gate bridge in San Francisco and Napa Valley Wine Country.

(Image: Instagram)

The pair are enjoying some quality time together and jetted to California for the sun-soaked bucket-list break earlier this week.

The comedian and TV presenter met in 2016 and got together last summer, but already have a loved-up life and even recently moved in together .

Both Iain and Laura have remained coy about their romance in the past with Iain speaking for the first time in March, when he shared a gushing tribute to his girlfriend.

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for Hugo Boss)

Since then, the pair have continued to speak about their relationship publicly more and more.

In March last year, Iain even admitted that he was punching above his weight with Laura.

Speaking on the Chris Ramsey Show, the funnyman admitted he was unfazed by peoples comments about their relationship because he agrees with them.

He joked: "I don't mind it, because it just means I've done better haven't I? I've got someone who's like me, but much, much better. And Laura's got someone who's like her, but much worse."
description: Voiceover Iain shared a sweet snap with Irish presenter Laura and confessed how loved-up he is with a hilarious sacrifice
authors: Dave Benett Getty Images For Hugo Boss
